q1.question: Is my data safe?
q1.answer: Absolutely! All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

q2.question: What image formats are supported?
q2.answer: We support all popular image formats including PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, and WebP. You can convert between any of these formats.

q3.question: How many images can I compress at once?
q3.answer: To ensure optimal browser performance, you can process up to 20 images per batch. For larger batches, simply process them in multiple rounds.

q4.question: Will compression reduce image quality?
q4.answer: You have full control over the compression quality (1%-100%). At 92% (default), most images maintain excellent visual quality while significantly reducing file size.

q5.question: Do I need to install any software?
q5.answer: No installation required! This is a web-based tool that works directly in your browser. Just visit the website and start compressing.

q6.question: Is there a file size limit?
q6.answer: There's no strict file size limit, but very large images may take longer to process. For best performance, we recommend images under 10MB each.

q7.question: Can I use this for commercial purposes?
q7.answer: Yes! You can use the compressed images for any purpose, including commercial projects. However, unauthorized copying or redistribution of this tool's source code is prohibited.

q8.question: What happens to my images after processing?
q8.answer: Since all processing happens in your browser, your images are never stored anywhere. Once you close the browser tab, all data is immediately cleared.

seo.title: CATLK - Smart Image Compressor - Free Online Image Compression Tool
seo.description: Free online image compression and format conversion tool. Support PNG, JPG, WebP and more. All processing happens locally in your browser, 100% secure and private.
